name: Inception
description: A thief enters dreams to steal secrets.
long_description: Dom Cobb, a skilled thief, infiltrates dreams to steal secrets. He faces a complex mission of planting an idea into a mind while confronting his own past.

name: Interstellar
description: Explorers travel through a wormhole to save humanity.
long_description: In a dying Earth, Cooper and a team travel through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity, confronting scientific and emotional challenges.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces chaos brought by the Joker.
long_description: Batman must stop the Joker from plunging Gotham into chaos while confronting his own limits and moral boundaries.

name: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of a crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.
long_description: The Corleone patriarch hands control to his son Michael, who must navigate loyalty, betrayal, and power in the criminal world.

name: Fight Club
description: An office worker and soap maker form an underground fight club.
long_description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with soap maker Tyler, exploring chaos, identity, and consumer culture.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: Interconnected stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles.
long_description: Pulp Fiction interweaves the lives of criminals, hitmen, and a boxer in Los Angeles, blending dark humor with crime and redemption stories.

name: Forrest Gump
description: The life journey of a simple man with a kind heart.
long_description: Forrest Gump, a man of simple nature, experiences pivotal historical events and finds love, showing the impact of kindness and destiny.

name: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation.
long_description: Neo discovers that the reality he knows is a simulated world controlled by machines, and joins a rebellion to free humanity.

name: Gladiator
description: A betrayed general fights for revenge in ancient Rome.
long_description: Maximus, a betrayed general, seeks vengeance against a corrupt emperor while fighting as a gladiator in ancient Rome.

name: Avatar
description: A marine on an alien planet torn between duty and love.
long_description: Jake Sully becomes part of the Na'vi on Pandora, torn between following orders and protecting the alien world he grows to love.

name: Breaking Bad
description: A chemistry teacher becomes a meth producer.
long_description: Walter White, a chemistry teacher diagnosed with cancer, starts producing meth to secure his family's future, descending into the criminal underworld.

name: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne.
long_description: Power struggles, betrayal, and war define the fight among noble families for the Iron Throne in Westeros.

name: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids face supernatural forces in their town.
long_description: In Hawkins, Indiana, kids encounter a girl with supernatural powers while facing secret government experiments and otherworldly creatures.

name: The Witcher
description: A monster hunter struggles to find his place in a chaotic world.
long_description: Geralt of Rivia navigates a world of monsters, magic, and political intrigue while seeking his destiny.

name: Peaky Blinders
description: A crime family rises in post-war Birmingham.
long_description: The Shelby family builds a criminal empire in post-WWI Birmingham, facing rival gangs, corruption, and personal conflicts.

name: Friends
description: Six friends navigate life and love in New York City.
long_description: The lives, romances, and comedic misadventures of six friends living in Manhattan unfold over ten seasons.

name: The Office
description: A mockumentary about the daily lives of office employees.
long_description: A humorous look at the mundane and absurd lives of employees at Dunder Mifflin paper company through a mockumentary format.

name: Sherlock
description: Modern-day Sherlock Holmes solves crimes in London.
long_description: Detective Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson solve intricate crimes in modern London while facing personal and intellectual challenges.

name: The Boys
description: A group of vigilantes fight corrupt superheroes.
long_description: Vigilantes expose corrupt superheroes exploiting their powers for profit while navigating moral ambiguity.

name: Chernobyl
description: The story of the 1986 nuclear disaster.
long_description: The catastrophic nuclear disaster in Chernobyl unfolds, showing the human, political, and environmental consequences.

name: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen to exact revenge and fulfill his destiny.
long_description: Paul Atreides joins the Fremen to reclaim Arrakis, leading epic battles and facing political intrigue while embracing his destiny.

name: Oppenheimer
description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and the creation of the atomic bomb.
long_description: A detailed depiction of J. Robert Oppenheimer's life and the moral and scientific challenges during the development of the atomic bomb.

name: Barbie
description: Barbie and Ken leave Barbie Land to explore the real world.
long_description: Barbie and Ken venture from the vibrant Barbie Land into the real world, experiencing adventures that challenge their understanding of identity and friendship.

name: Joker
description: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral into madness.
long_description: Arthur Fleck struggles with mental illness and societal neglect, descending into violence and embracing the persona of the Joker.

name: Parasite
description: A poor family infiltrates a wealthy household with unexpected consequences.
long_description: The struggling Kim family schemes their way into the lives of the wealthy Parks, leading to tension, deception, and unforeseen tragedy.

name: The Batman
description: Batman investigates a Series of murders in Gotham linked to corruption.
long_description: Batman uncovers corruption and a string of violent crimes in Gotham while confronting his own moral code and past.

name: Tenet
description: A secret agent manipulates time to prevent global catastrophe.
long_description: A secret agent navigates time inversion technology to prevent a global disaster, facing paradoxes and high-stakes missions.

name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker faces multiverse chaos when old villains return.
long_description: Peter Parker navigates the consequences of revealing his identity, confronting villains from multiple universes and struggling to save reality.

name: Everything Everywhere All at Once
description: A laundromat owner is pulled into a multiverse adventure.
long_description: Evelyn discovers multiple versions of herself across the multiverse, navigating absurd adventures to save existence.

name: The Last of Us
description: A smuggler escorts a teenage girl across post-apocalyptic America.
long_description: Joel escorts Ellie, a teenage girl immune to a deadly infection, across a ravaged America while forming a profound bond.

name: House of the Dragon
description: A prequel to Game of Thrones, following House Targaryen's rise and fall.
long_description: Follow the Targaryen dynasty centuries before Game of Thrones, exploring political schemes, family rivalry, and the power of dragons.

name: Wednesday
description: Wednesday Addams attends Nevermore Academy and investigates mysteries.
long_description: Wednesday Addams navigates high school life at Nevermore Academy while solving supernatural mysteries and embracing her dark identity.

name: Squid Game
description: Hundreds compete in deadly children's games for a cash prize.
long_description: Participants risk their lives in deadly childhood games to win a massive cash prize, exposing desperation and human nature.

name: Euphoria
description: A group of teens navigates identity, trauma, and relationships.
long_description: Teens explore identity, addiction, trauma, and love while facing the challenges of modern adolescence.

name: The Queen's Gambit
description: An orphaned chess prodigy rises to fame while battling addiction.
long_description: Beth Harmon rises as a chess prodigy, navigating fame, addiction, and personal relationships in her journey to greatness.

name: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter in the Star Wars universe protects a mysterious child.
long_description: A Mandalorian bounty hunter navigates the galaxy while protecting a mysterious child, forming bonds and facing powerful enemies.

name: Loki
description: The God of Mischief travels through time and alternate realities.
long_description: Loki navigates the multiverse, confronting alternate versions of himself and challenging the timelines controlled by the TVA.

name: Better Call Saul
description: The transformation of Jimmy McGill into the criminal lawyer Saul Goodman.
long_description: Jimmy McGill transforms from a struggling lawyer into the cunning and morally flexible Saul Goodman, navigating crime and legal battles.

name: The Bear
description: A young chef returns home to run his family's sandwich shop.
long_description: Carmen returns home to run her family's sandwich shop, facing high-pressure challenges while rebuilding personal and professional life.

name: Severance
description: Office workers undergo a procedure that separates work and personal memories.
long_description: Employees at Lumon Industries undergo a procedure separating work and personal memories, revealing mysteries and ethical dilemmas.
